modName: Claire Save Slot for Enhanced Character Edit
summary: this is a character slot file for ECE. NOT a save file.
descriptionHtml:
This is a character slot file for ECE. NOT a save file.

Installation guide :
1. Do not use NMM for installation.
2. Download and install requirement mods.
3. Download this slot file and extract.
4. Copy the slot file and paste to my document/my games/skyrim/CME_save/
5. Start the game and go to character creation menu (by using "showracemenu command or face sculptor in riften).
6. Load slot number. slot number 2 (original setting with sg hair and eye mod). slot number 16 (same as slot number 2, but use vanila hair and eye).

Unistallation guide :
1. delete the slot file.
2. or overwrite the slot file with new settings.

Requirement mods :
1. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanched Character Edit[/url]

2. Any eyes textures mod (the eye of beauty, cover eyes, and so on).
Note : eye texture in screenshot was use Eye colours with new style Eyelashes. But as far as i know that mod no longer avaliable on nexus.

3. Any hair models mod (ex: apachii skyhair, cazy hair, numnume hair, and so on).
Note: hair model in screenshot was sg hair. you can find that hair by using google, just search it. if you luck.

4. body texture : [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]sg female textures[/url] + [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]mature skin textures[/url]. install sg female texture first. then use diffuse map(femalehead.dss, femalebody_1.dss, femalehand_1.dss) from mature skin to overwrite diffuse map from sg texture.
Note: basicly i use textures from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40038/?]jordis bijin warmaiden version v 2.5 - unp[/url] then i use diffuse map from mature skin to overwrite the original diffuse map. when i ask the author of bijin warmaiden about textures he use on jordis, he said it was sg female texture.

5.[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]sg female eyebrows[/url]

Version History :
Version 1.1 :
Add setting with vanila hair and eye.
Version 1 :
Initial release
author: Nafis399
